mapper.select: SELECT post_no AS postNo, user_no AS userNo, post_title AS postTitle, post_content AS postContent, post_write_datetime AS postWriteDatetime, post_check_hide AS postCheckHide, post_hits AS postHits FROM Posts WHERE post_no = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Posts(user_no, post_title, post_content, post_write_datetime, post_check_hide, post_hits) VALUES (${num}, '${Post.title}', '${Post.content}', '${Post.writeDate}', false, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE Posts SET post_title='${title}', post_content='${content}' WHERE post_no = #{id}
UPDATE Posts SET post_check_hide=1 WHERE post_no = #{id}
UPDATE Posts SET post_check_hide=0 WHERE post_no = #{id}
